model.name: Architect 35MM Belt
model.disambiguatingDescription: The slim strap and sculpturally elegant fastening makes the Architect 35mm belt a refined finishing touch for business attire. This updated version of a coveted House style features the familiar Damier canvas strap and an artful interpretation of the Ardillon buckle. For added signature appeal, the design is finished with iconic LV Initials on the belt loop.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Width: 1.4 inches/35 mm
  • Damier Graphite
  • Damier canvas strap
  • Calf leather lining
  • Silver-color hardware
  • Architect buckle
  • LV Initials on belt loop
  • Louis Vuitton signature engraving on buckle
